statements: SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM access_control WHERE password = 'secure@123';
SELECT id, username FROM access_control WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role = 'user' AND username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT id, role FROM access_control WHERE username = 'alice' OR username = 'bob';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role='Admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM access_control WHERE password LIKE '%123%' AND role='User';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR role='Manager';
SELECT id, role FROM access_control WHERE username='john_doe' AND password='secure123';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM access_control WHERE role='User';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users GROUP BY role;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE resource='dashboard' AND permission_type='read';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE resource LIKE '%document%';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles INNER JOIN permissions ON roles.id = permissions.role_id;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role, permission FROM role_permissions ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 3 AND role = 'Admin';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission, user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission = 'admin';
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM user_roles ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM user_permissions JOIN user_roles ON user_permissions.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 10 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM users ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT MAX(access_level) AS max_access_level FROM users;
